FuncDef:
The ipv4-family command displays the MPLS LDP IPv4 view.
By default, the MPLS LDP IPv4 view is not displayed.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The ipv4-family command displays the MPLS LDP IPv4 view. The lsp-trigger and propagate mapping commands can be run in the MPLS LDP IPv4 view to control the LDP IPv4 LSP establishment.
Prerequisites
The following operations have been performed:
Run the mpls command in the system view to enable MPLS globally.Run the mpls ldp command in the system view to enable MPLS LDP globally.
